DOC.brief_summary: The primary goal study examine determinant efficacy Claritin .
DOC.detailed_description: Subjects give Claritin 10mg tablet . Subjects challenge histamine via skin prick prior Claritin administration 1 2 hour post administration . We measure record wheal flare area 10 minute follow challenge .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria . 1 . Males females 18 65 year age . Exclusion Criteria . 1 . Pregnant lactating woman . 2 . Upper respiratory infection within 14 day study start . 3 . Women childbearing potential use specific contraception method ( ) ( i.e. , birth control pill , depo Provera , double barrier ) well woman breastfeed . 4 . Patients severe medical condition ( ) view investigator prohibit participation study ( heart , lung , kidney , neurological , oncologic liver disease ) . 5 . Use investigational agent last 30 day . 6 . Use medication may affect skin test . Specifically , subject exclude used antihistamine 4 day precede treatment visit .
